contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 30, 2006 D BBC Radio Cymru Band of the Year (Round 2)
BBC Radio Wales Band of the Year 0 Entertainments Contest
bbc-radio-wales-band-of-the-year
All 6 bands recorded a radio broadcast for BBC Radio Cymru during September 2006. These broadcasts were adjudicated and the best 3 performances chosen to go forward to the live final on 25 November 2006.
Aug. 18, 2015, 9:15 p.m. Aug. 18, 2015, 9:16 p.m.
1 Cory Band Robert Childs
2 Tredegar Town Band Michael Fowles
3 Northop Band Thomas Wyss
4 Abergavenny Borough Band Unknown
5 Cwmaman Institute Silver (Tower Colliery) Band Nigel Seaman
6 Wrexham Brass Unknown
